00004 // This class catalogues files in a directory and all its subdirectories
00005 //
00006 #ifndef FILECAT_H
00007 #define FILECAT_H
00008 
00009 #include "stringicmp.h"
00010 #include <string>
00011 #include <set>
00012 
00013 
00014 class TFileCat {
00015 public:
00016 
00017       TFileCat(std::string root) { NewCat(root); }
00018       TFileCat() {}
00019 
00020       // Build a new file catalogue by recursively traversing the root directory
00021       void NewCat(std::string root);
00022 
00023       std::string GetRootDir() const { return fRootDir; }
00024 
00025       // Look for a given file in the catalogue
00026       // Unless pathIncludesRoot == true, will prepend the root directory to path
00027       bool FindFile(std::string path, bool pathIncludesRoot = false) const;
00028 
00029       // Delete a given file from the catalogue
00030       // Unless pathIncludesRoot == true, will prepend the root directory to path
00031       size_t RemoveFile(std::string path, bool pathIncludesRoot = false);
00032 
00033       // Delete all files from a given directory in the catalogue
00034       // Unless pathIncludesRoot == true, will prepend the root directory to path
00035       size_t RemoveDir(std::string dir, bool pathIncludesRoot = false);
00036 
00037 private:
00038 
00039       typedef std::set<std::string, TStringiLess> TCatalogue;
00040 
00041       std::string fRootDir;
00042       TCatalogue fFileCat;
00043 
00044       // Recursively traverse a directory, adding regular files to the catalogue
00045       void TraverseDir(std::string dir, int depth = -1);
00046 };
00047 
00048 #endif // FILECAT_H
